mapper.insert: insert into tb_shop (shop_name, shop_desc, shop_addr, phone, shop_img, create_time, last_edit_time, advice, area_id, owner_id, shop_category_id, enable_status, priority) values (#{shopName}, #{shopDesc}, #{shopAddr}, #{phone}, #{shopImg}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime}, #{advice}, #{area.areaId}, #{owner.userId}, #{shopCategory.shopCategoryId}, #{enableStatus}, #{priority})
mapper.select: select s.shop_id, s.shop_name, s.shop_desc, s.shop_addr, s.phone, s.shop_img, s.priority, s.create_time, s.last_edit_time, s.enable_status, s.advice, a.area_id, a.area_name, sc.shop_category_id, sc.shop_category_name, p.user_id, p.name from tb_shop s, tb_area a, tb_shop_category sc, tb_person_info p where s.area_id = a.area_id and s.shop_category_id = sc.shop_category_id and s.owner_id = p.user_id and s.shop_id = #{shopId}
